parameters.sqlQuery:
MERGE `victims-of-ink-data-platform.voi_warehouse.sale_items` T
USING `victims-of-ink-data-platform.voi_warehouse.sale_items_stage` S
ON T.SALE_ITEM_ID = S.SALE_ITEM_ID

WHEN MATCHED THEN
  UPDATE SET
    SALE_ID = S.SALE_ID,
    BOOKING_ID = S.BOOKING_ID,
    LOCATION_ID = S.LOCATION_ID,
    MERCHANT_ID = S.MERCHANT_ID,
    TEAM_MEMBER_ID = S.TEAM_MEMBER_ID,
    CLIENT_ID = S.CLIENT_ID,
    SALE_DATE = S.SALE_DATE,
    SALE_NUMBER = S.SALE_NUMBER,
    SALE_STATUS = S.SALE_STATUS,
    LOCATION = S.LOCATION,
    TEAM_MEMBER = S.TEAM_MEMBER,
    MERCHANT = S.MERCHANT,
    CLIENT = S.CLIENT,
    CLIENT_GENDER = S.CLIENT_GENDER,
    CLIENT_SOURCE = S.CLIENT_SOURCE,
    CLIENT_RETENTION_SOURCE = S.CLIENT_RETENTION_SOURCE,
    CLIENT_MOBILE = S.CLIENT_MOBILE,
    DISCOUNT_CATEGORY = S.DISCOUNT_CATEGORY,
    DISCOUNT_TYPE = S.DISCOUNT_TYPE,
    DISCOUNT_NAME = S.DISCOUNT_NAME,
    APPOINTMENT_CHANNEL = S.APPOINTMENT_CHANNEL,
    APPOINTMENT_REF = S.APPOINTMENT_REF,
    TRANSACTION_TYPE = S.TRANSACTION_TYPE,
    PAYMENT_METHOD = S.PAYMENT_METHOD,
    SALE_TYPE = S.SALE_TYPE,
    CATEGORY = S.CATEGORY,
    ITEM = S.ITEM,
    SUPPLIER = S.SUPPLIER,
    BRAND = S.BRAND,
    SKU = S.SKU,
    BARCODE = S.BARCODE,
    IS_UPSELL = S.IS_UPSELL,
    CURRENCY_CODE = S.CURRENCY_CODE,
    QUANTITY = S.QUANTITY,
    GROSS_SALES = S.GROSS_SALES,
    DISCOUNTS = S.DISCOUNTS,
    CART_DISCOUNTS = S.CART_DISCOUNTS,
    ITEM_DISCOUNTS = S.ITEM_DISCOUNTS,
    REFUNDS = S.REFUNDS,
    NET_SALES = S.NET_SALES,
    TAXES_ON_NET_SALES = S.TAXES_ON_NET_SALES,
    TOTAL_SALES = S.TOTAL_SALES,
    COST = S.COST,
    _loaded_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()

WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
  INSERT (
    SALE_ITEM_ID,
    SALE_ID,
    BOOKING_ID,
    LOCATION_ID,
    MERCHANT_ID,
    TEAM_MEMBER_ID,
    CLIENT_ID,
    SALE_DATE,
    SALE_NUMBER,
    SALE_STATUS,
    LOCATION,
    TEAM_MEMBER,
    MERCHANT,
    CLIENT,
    CLIENT_GENDER,
    CLIENT_SOURCE,
    CLIENT_RETENTION_SOURCE,
    CLIENT_MOBILE,
    DISCOUNT_CATEGORY,
    DISCOUNT_TYPE,
    DISCOUNT_NAME,
    APPOINTMENT_CHANNEL,
    APPOINTMENT_REF,
    TRANSACTION_TYPE,
    PAYMENT_METHOD,
    SALE_TYPE,
    CATEGORY,
    ITEM,
    SUPPLIER,
    BRAND,
    SKU,
    BARCODE,
    IS_UPSELL,
    CURRENCY_CODE,
    QUANTITY,
    GROSS_SALES,
    DISCOUNTS,
    CART_DISCOUNTS,
    ITEM_DISCOUNTS,
    REFUNDS,
    NET_SALES,
    TAXES_ON_NET_SALES,
    TOTAL_SALES,
    COST,
    _loaded_at
  )
  VALUES (
    S.SALE_ITEM_ID,
    S.SALE_ID,
    S.BOOKING_ID,
    S.LOCATION_ID,
    S.MERCHANT_ID,
    S.TEAM_MEMBER_ID,
    S.CLIENT_ID,
    S.SALE_DATE,
    S.SALE_NUMBER,
    S.SALE_STATUS,
    S.LOCATION,
    S.TEAM_MEMBER,
    S.MERCHANT,
    S.CLIENT,
    S.CLIENT_GENDER,
    S.CLIENT_SOURCE,
    S.CLIENT_RETENTION_SOURCE,
    S.CLIENT_MOBILE,
    S.DISCOUNT_CATEGORY,
    S.DISCOUNT_TYPE,
    S.DISCOUNT_NAME,
    S.APPOINTMENT_CHANNEL,
    S.APPOINTMENT_REF,
    S.TRANSACTION_TYPE,
    S.PAYMENT_METHOD,
    S.SALE_TYPE,
    S.CATEGORY,
    S.ITEM,
    S.SUPPLIER,
    S.BRAND,
    S.SKU,
    S.BARCODE,
    S.IS_UPSELL,
    S.CURRENCY_CODE,
    S.QUANTITY,
    S.GROSS_SALES,
    S.DISCOUNTS,
    S.CART_DISCOUNTS,
    S.ITEM_DISCOUNTS,
    S.REFUNDS,
    S.NET_SALES,
    S.TAXES_ON_NET_SALES,
    S.TOTAL_SALES,
    S.COST,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()
  );
